12d 12e grab bb back of round 12 bl & back of round 12 bl & bb bb 7 the pattern panel 1 13- 16 15 half_double_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch *9 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet decrease* x 2 insert panel 1 inside single_crochet each stitch slip_stitch to **panel 2 has an extra panel 2 first single_crochet ch1 100 round in the wall** 21 crab in each stitch fo 100 9 i m so proud of you congratulations on finishing this pattern you ve taken an idea and turned it into something beautiful with your own two hands how amazing is that crochet is such a joyful journey filled with creativity relaxation and the thrill of bringing a design to life i hope you felt that same sense of excitement and accomplishment while working through this pattern and that it brought you as much joy as it brought me to create it thank you for being part of this journey with me always remember crochet is more than a craft it s a celebration of patience creativity and love and you are now part of that legacy with love and yarn melanie bloss
